page.title: 07COBERLEY SCHOOL: PUPIL
page.content: Coberley is a mixed school. The pupils of Coberley like their school. Most people get on with each other and there is a happy atmosphere. The subjects the pupils miss learning are languages. They work in two classes, junior and infant. They enjoy sport. They play shinty, football, rounders and netball. For three subjects, sport, drama and music they join up with ten other schools. They are very sporty and play rounders most playtimes. In lessons they work from different work books. There is no set timetable and they do what the teacher decides. The older pupils sometimes help the younger ones. The pupils don't mind playing against older children and they don't mind losing.
